articles.author: Niniek Karmini, AP
articles.title: 16 dead, thousands caught in flooding in Indonesia's capital
articles.description: Severe flooding in Indonesia's capital as residents celebrated the new year has killed at least 16 people, displaced tens of thousands and forced an airport to close
articles.content:
JAKARTA, Indonesia Severe flooding in Indonesias capital as residents celebrated the new year has killed at least 16 people, displaced tens of thousands and forced an airport to close, the countrys disaster management agency said Thursday.
Monsoon rains and … [+2149 chars]

articles.author: Arthur Brooks
articles.title: How to avoid the traps that produce loneliness and isolation
articles.description: “Hell is other people,” wrote the French existentialist Jean-Paul Sartre in his 1944 play “No Exit.” Sartre was wrong. Hell is the lack of other people, and according to the health-insurance company Cigna, loneliness and social isolation are rampant in the Un…
articles.content: You might ask why there is a sudden research interest in this topic. The answer: Researchers are discovering that loneliness harms both mental and physical health. But the real question is why so many people feel isolated, when contact with others should be e… [+5147 chars]
